title: Advanced Mathematics E-Learning Content Development Using Dialogue-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematics and programming concepts, along with experience using Learning Management Systems (LMS)
context.additional_context: Learning to design mathematics education content in conversation-based formats at the graduate level, with flexible learning environments utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can design math learning activities in XML format compliant with IMS LD standards.
Learners can generate learning design packages using conversation-based authoring tools.
Learners can iteratively improve math learning content by reflecting on formative assessment results.
Learners can analyze interaction patterns between learning activities to design optimal learning pathways.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
